portfolios.title: Unique Product Design
portfolios.subtitle: Luxury Menswear Brand
description: Infinity Designhub has given a unique identity by creating a logo design and visual identity concept for this clothing brand. The concept of logo is 'R and N monogram' and finishing touch is iconic mark for the company, that gives rich look to the brand.
One of the most important aspects of a successful branding project is communication. And one of the best parts of being a designer is that I get to communicate not only verbally, but visually.
